definition: to counterfeit/to falsify/to cheat/to defraud/fraudulent/to behave affectedly
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: One who gives false witness against his neighbour is a hammer and a sword and a sharp arrow.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證陷害鄰舍的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: He is suspected of employing trickery.
Second, most people posing as deficit hawks are faking it.
sentences.chinese: 第二，冒充預算鷹派的大多數人是在作假。

sentences.english: Finding evidence of that sort of skulduggery may be difficult, and proving it even more so.
sentences.chinese: 想找到這種類型的作假十分困難，更不用說找出證據。

sentences.english: Figures in science are believed to have used the finagle factor.
sentences.chinese: 一些科學界最主要的人物被認爲有過作假的行爲。

sentences.english: Cheat in your education, and your income suffers.
sentences.chinese: 在上學時弄虛作假，你的收入就會受害。

sentences.english: Like a club or a sword or a sharp arrow is the man who gives false testimony against his neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證陷害鄰舍的，就是大磓，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證的必滅亡，惟有聽真情而言的，其言長存。

sentences.english: A man that beareth false witness against his neighbour [is] a maul, and a sword, and a sharp arrow.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證陷害鄰舍的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: The head of the bureau decided to make a personal inspection visit so as to prevent them from colluding in counterfeiting.
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止他們之間串氣作假，局長決定親自去視察。

sentences.english: A false witness will perish, and whoever listens to him will be destroyed forever.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證的必滅亡，惟有聽真情而言的，其言長存。

sentences.english: You need to passionately share what you believe in, but don't fake it.
sentences.chinese: 你需要熱情地分享你所相信的，但不要弄虛作假。

sentences.english: Like a war club, a sword, or a sharp arrow as one who bears false witness against a neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證陷害鄰居的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: Our professional writers will help you in getting an ideal custom essay.
sentences.chinese: 我們專業的作假講幫助你完成理想中的論文。

sentences.english: One key hazard, says Lehman's Schulte, is fraud.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟的肖特說，一個關鍵的不利因素是弄虛作假。

sentences.english: He pledged tough penalties on corporations and chief officers who falsify accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他揚言將嚴懲作假帳的企業和主管人員。

definition: to counterfeit/to pass off a fake as genuine
covert activities (election rigging etc)/under-the-table manipulations/black operations
to mix in fake material/to adulterate
hard to distinguish real from imitation
to pass off fish eyes for pearls/to pass off fake products as genuine (idiom)
to assume sb's name and take his place (idiom); to impersonate/to pose under a false name
